TI_DOC.P: EIB - Gushi Biomass Project - Supply of CHP Turbine and Generator set (CN-Zhengzhou)

STI_DOC.P: This is a re-publication of Procurement Notice 2017/S 065-121756 originally published in OJ/S 065 of 1.4.2017.

CONTENTS.P: Project: EIB financed Gushi County Biomass Project
Scope of Bid: Supply of CHP Turbine and Generator set
Purchaser: Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd

Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd (hereinafter called “the Borrower”) has received a loan from the European investment bank (EIB) (hereinafter called “the bank”), toward the cost of the Gushi biomass project (Nº 2013 - 0464) (hereinafter called “the project”). This international invitation for tenders relates to the contract for: Gushi biomass project, Lot 3, supply of CHP turbine and generator set.

This contract will include: Supply of CHP steam turbine (25MW) and generator set (30MW), including but not limited to, Steam turbine body, Cylinder assembly, Main steam valve, Condenser body, Generator and Exciter..
This Contract is expected to be implemented from 1.5.2018 to 28.2.2019. (10 months)
The bid evaluation criteria shall be as following, in decreasing order of importance：
Under the condition that the bidder is qualified for the requirements specified in the bidding documents, the lowest evaluated bid shall be accepted.

(a) Financial capability: The audited financial statements for the past 3 years (including the auditor’s reports, the balance sheets, the profit and loss sheets and the cash flow sheets). The bidder’s cumulative turnover should be no less than 300 000 000 RMB (or equivalent in foreign currency) of the years of 2014-2016, with profit each of these 3 years;

(b) Experience and technical capability: At least 4 contracts, or other proven documents, completed by the bidder as the contractor for each year during the period of 2010 to 2017, with aggregated contract price no less than 50 000 000 RMB for goods supplies of CHP turbines and generators. The originals of the said documents should be presented for checking on request during the bid opening session;

(c) The bidder shall furnish documentary evidence to demonstrate that the goods it offers meet the following requirements: if the bidder is not the manufacturer, the manufacturer’s authorization and ISO9000 Certificate;
All firms from eligible sources countries as defined in the procurement guidelines of the bank and also qualified for the above mentioned requirements, are invited to participate in the tender.
Interested eligible bidders may obtain further information from, and inspect the bidding documents at:
Office: Department 7 of Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
Address:B-9, Jincheng Building, 187 Dongming Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou, P.R. China
Contact person: Ms. Ding Jiangrui
e-mail: guojizhaobiao7@126.com

A complete set of bidding documents may be purchased on the submission of an application to the above address, and upon payment of a non-refundable fee of 2 100 RMB (in word: two thousand and one hundred RMB) or 300 EUR (in word: three hundred EUR) to the following bank account, bearing the name of the project.
On request, against a faxed copy of the evidence of the remittance, the bidding documents may be sent by courier service.
Bank Account Information:
Name: Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
RMB Bank Account: China Construction Bank (CCB) Zhengzhou Branch
EUR Bank Account: China CITIC Bank Zhengzhou Branch (Zhengzhou, China)

A Bid Security of 350 000 RMB (in word: three hundred fifty thousand RMB) or 50 000 EUR (in word: fifty thousand EUR) fulfilling the conditions indicated in the bidding documents must accompany all bids.

All bids must be delivered, airmail or courier for overseas delivery and surface mail or courier for local delivery but not by electronic, in closed envelopes bearing the mention “Bid for: Gushi Biomass Project, Lot 3, Supply of CHP Turbine and Generator set” not later than 10Am Beijing Time on 19.3.2018_at the following address:
Agency and Address for delivery of Bids:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Address: No.1 Conference Room, B-11 Jincheng Building, 187 Dongming Road, Jinshui District,

CONTENTS.P: Bids will be opened immediately in the presence of Bidders’ representatives who choose to attend at 10 am 19.3.2018.

CONTENTS.P: Project: EIB financed Gushi County Biomass Project
Scope of Bid: Supply of CHP Turbine and Generator set
Purchaser: Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd

Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd (hereinafter called “the Borrower”) has received a loan from the European investment bank (EIB) (hereinafter called “the bank”), toward the cost of the Gushi biomass project (Nº 2013 - 0464) (hereinafter called “the project”). This international invitation for tenders relates to the contract for: Gushi biomass project, Lot 3, supply of CHP turbine and generator set.

This contract will include: Supply of CHP steam turbine (25MW) and generator set (30MW), including but not limited to, Steam turbine body, Cylinder assembly, Main steam valve, Condenser body, Generator and Exciter..
This Contract is expected to be implemented from 1.5.2018 to 28.2.2019. (10 months)
The bid evaluation criteria shall be as following, in decreasing order of importance：
Under the condition that the bidder is qualified for the requirements specified in the bidding documents, the lowest evaluated bid shall be accepted.

(a) Financial capability: The audited financial statements for the past 3 years (including the auditor’s reports, the balance sheets, the profit and loss sheets and the cash flow sheets). The bidder’s cumulative turnover should be no less than 300 000 000 RMB (or equivalent in foreign currency) of the years of 2014-2016, with profit each of these 3 years;

(b) Experience and technical capability: At least 4 contracts, or other proven documents, completed by the bidder as the contractor for each year during the period of 2010 to 2017, with aggregated contract price no less than 50 000 000 RMB for goods supplies of CHP turbines and generators. The originals of the said documents should be presented for checking on request during the bid opening session;

(c) The bidder shall furnish documentary evidence to demonstrate that the goods it offers meet the following requirements: if the bidder is not the manufacturer, the manufacturer’s authorization and ISO9000 Certificate;
All firms from eligible sources countries as defined in the procurement guidelines of the bank and also qualified for the above mentioned requirements, are invited to participate in the tender.
Interested eligible bidders may obtain further information from, and inspect the bidding documents at:
Office: Department 7 of Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
Address:B-9, Jincheng Building, 187 Dongming Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou, P.R. China
Contact person: Ms. Ding Jiangrui
e-mail: guojizhaobiao7@126.com

A complete set of bidding documents may be purchased on the submission of an application to the above address, and upon payment of a non-refundable fee of 2 100 RMB (in word: two thousand and one hundred RMB) or 300 EUR (in word: three hundred EUR) to the following bank account, bearing the name of the project.
On request, against a faxed copy of the evidence of the remittance, the bidding documents may be sent by courier service.
Bank Account Information:
Name: Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
RMB Bank Account: China Construction Bank (CCB) Zhengzhou Branch
EUR Bank Account: China CITIC Bank Zhengzhou Branch (Zhengzhou, China)

A Bid Security of 350 000 RMB (in word: three hundred fifty thousand RMB) or 50 000 EUR (in word: fifty thousand EUR) fulfilling the conditions indicated in the bidding documents must accompany all bids.

All bids must be delivered, airmail or courier for overseas delivery and surface mail or courier for local delivery but not by electronic, in closed envelopes bearing the mention “Bid for: Gushi Biomass Project, Lot 3, Supply of CHP Turbine and Generator set” not later than 10Am Beijing Time on 19.3.2018_at the following address:
Agency and Address for delivery of Bids:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Address: No.1 Conference Room, B-11 Jincheng Building, 187 Dongming Road, Jinshui District,

CONTENTS.P: Bids will be opened immediately in the presence of Bidders’ representatives who choose to attend at 10 am 19.3.2018.

TI_DOC.P: EIB - Gushi Biomass Project - Supply of CHP Turbine and Generator set (CN-Zhengzhou)

STI_DOC.P: This is a re-publication of Procurement Notice 2017/S 065-121756 originally published in OJ/S 065 of 1.4.2017.

CONTENTS.P: Project: EIB financed Gushi County Biomass Project
Scope of Bid: Supply of CHP Turbine and Generator set
Purchaser: Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd

Gushi Yangshan Mingyuan Industry Co., Ltd (hereinafter called “the Borrower”) has received a loan from the European investment bank (EIB) (hereinafter called “the bank”), toward the cost of the Gushi biomass project (Nº 2013 - 0464) (hereinafter called “the project”). This international invitation for tenders relates to the contract for: Gushi biomass project, Lot 3, supply of CHP turbine and generator set.

This contract will include: Supply of CHP steam turbine (25MW) and generator set (30MW), including but not limited to, Steam turbine body, Cylinder assembly, Main steam valve, Condenser body, Generator and Exciter..
This Contract is expected to be implemented from 1.5.2018 to 28.2.2019. (10 months)
The bid evaluation criteria shall be as following, in decreasing order of importance：
Under the condition that the bidder is qualified for the requirements specified in the bidding documents, the lowest evaluated bid shall be accepted.

(a) Financial capability: The audited financial statements for the past 3 years (including the auditor’s reports, the balance sheets, the profit and loss sheets and the cash flow sheets). The bidder’s cumulative turnover should be no less than 300 000 000 RMB (or equivalent in foreign currency) of the years of 2014-2016, with profit each of these 3 years;

(b) Experience and technical capability: At least 4 contracts, or other proven documents, completed by the bidder as the contractor for each year during the period of 2010 to 2017, with aggregated contract price no less than 50 000 000 RMB for goods supplies of CHP turbines and generators. The originals of the said documents should be presented for checking on request during the bid opening session;

(c) The bidder shall furnish documentary evidence to demonstrate that the goods it offers meet the following requirements: if the bidder is not the manufacturer, the manufacturer’s authorization and ISO9000 Certificate;
All firms from eligible sources countries as defined in the procurement guidelines of the bank and also qualified for the above mentioned requirements, are invited to participate in the tender.
Interested eligible bidders may obtain further information from, and inspect the bidding documents at:
Office: Department 7 of Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
Address:B-9, Jincheng Building, 187 Dongming Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou, P.R. China
Contact person: Ms. Ding Jiangrui
e-mail: guojizhaobiao7@126.com

A complete set of bidding documents may be purchased on the submission of an application to the above address, and upon payment of a non-refundable fee of 2 100 RMB (in word: two thousand and one hundred RMB) or 300 EUR (in word: three hundred EUR) to the following bank account, bearing the name of the project.
On request, against a faxed copy of the evidence of the remittance, the bidding documents may be sent by courier service.
Bank Account Information:
Name: Henan International M/E Tendering Co., Ltd
RMB Bank Account: China Construction Bank (CCB) Zhengzhou Branch
EUR Bank Account: China CITIC Bank Zhengzhou Branch (Zhengzhou, China)

A Bid Security of 350 000 RMB (in word: three hundred fifty thousand RMB) or 50 000 EUR (in word: fifty thousand EUR) fulfilling the conditions indicated in the bidding documents must accompany all bids.

All bids must be delivered, airmail or courier for overseas delivery and surface mail or courier for local delivery but not by electronic, in closed envelopes bearing the mention “Bid for: Gushi Biomass Project, Lot 3, Supply of CHP Turbine and Generator set” not later than 10Am Beijing Time on 19.3.2018_at the following address:
